summary: Frontend testing of new FloatingSearch mockup component and image loading verification. All requested features working correctly.
passed_tests: Floating search button is visible in bottom-right corner
Clicking floating search button expands the search bar
Category dropdown shows all 6 categories (All, Golf, Hotels, Restaurants, Cafés & Bars, Beach Clubs)
All 5 quick category filter buttons visible and clickable (Golf Courses, Hotels, Restaurants, Cafés & Bars, Beach Clubs)
Search input field accepts text input
Close button (X) is present and visible
ESC key successfully closes the search bar
MOCKUP notice is displayed at bottom of search bar
ESC hint is displayed to users
All 12 beach club images loading correctly
Navigation menu items work correctly (Golf, Hotels, Restaurants, Cafés & Bars, Beach Clubs)
critical_code_review_comments: FloatingSearch component well-implemented with proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Multi-language support correctly implemented for search placeholders and category labels
ESC key and click-outside handlers properly cleanup event listeners
context_for_next_testing_agent: FloatingSearch mockup component fully functional with all categories (Golf, Hotels, Restaurants, Cafés & Bars, Beach Clubs). Images updated from Unsplash/blocked CDNs to Pexels URLs and all loading correctly. Search is MOCKED - no backend functionality. All previous features from iteration_3 still working.

mocked_features.search_functionality: The FloatingSearch is a MOCKUP - UI elements are visible and interactive but there is no actual search/filter functionality implemented yet
